title: Kled W level up bug and E Flash bug
body:
While in your violent tendencies strikes. If you level up that ability you will do normal damage (with no extra damage animation) on the 4th hit.

If you try to E and flash during the animation (like a Shen dash) you will always stop at the point you flashed to.

Please, help a poor Yordle{{champion:240}}  and donate mushroom juice!!.... and maybe move it up the thread or what ever -3-
